name: Rotary Park
description: Rotary Park consists of 10.4 acres and is one of Johnson City’s most popular parks, featuring six covered picnic shelters, restrooms, picnic tables, a multi-use playing field, and a brand new inclusive playground area. ‘Splash town’ is the newest addition to the playground and offers a play area where kids can experience 10 different water sequences. Rotary park is open daily from 9 a.m. to 9 p.m. and the splash pad operates daily from 10 am to 7pm, weather permitting from Memorial Day through Labor Day.
location: 1001 N Broadway St, Johnson City, TN 37601
